summary: Makes Lunar Moths Brighter, 2x resolution texture, with added detail.
descriptionHtml:
Makes Lunar Moths Brighter, 2x resolution texture, with added detail. Make sure your PC can handle bigger textures.

This makes them seem more \"lunar\" and less \"grey\". 

If I could get them to glow, I would :D

Installation:

Place texture folder into data folder merge files.

Feel free to use this as you wish in other mod packs compilations etc. No permission necessary, just credit me.

More mods:

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3134] - HD Rabbits (black)[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3866]  - Harley Quinn Jester Outfit[/url]

See the full list: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=697950] here[/url]
author: Chocolambot
